answers.answer: my first pregnancy i was constantly in and out of the hospital from dehydration and so i always had to get ivs. my 3rd and 4th were good. and this pregnancy was kinda bad in the begging but around 18 weeks it got better but at 33 weeks some nausea came back mild but not everyday.

Well with my 1st My Doctors didn't notice my preeclampsia until I was ready to deliver it was terrible, and With my Second I constantly had to be monitored and was having complications and I currently on my 3rd now which I'm experience some complications with now as well

question: Did you have a rough pregnancy (hypertension,preclampsia, anything else go wrong) and then the next one be awesome?
title: For moms who have multiple kids
